resources.string:
Career Mate is an intelligent job-seeking assistant, designed to provide comprehensive support throughout the job search process. Utilizing AI technology, it accurately analyzes users' resumes to create personalized career profiles, covering essential details such as personal information, educational background, skill strengths, and project experience. 

With in-depth analysis, Career Mate empowers users to stand out in the competitive job market. Whether for newcomers or seasoned professionals, Career Mate serves as a valuable partner in career advancement. 

If you have any problem, please feel free to contact this mail address: 

 			daiystudio2010@gmail.com
